item.title: The 3rd Wave of Cloud Computing
item.description: That’s quite an opening statement, isn’t it? As a reminder, the 1st and 2nd waves were Virtual Machines and Containers, respectively. Warning, profound statement inboundâ€¦ The Docker cofounder, Solomon Hykes, said this in 2019 “If WASM+WASI existed in 2008, we wouldn’t have needed to create Docker. That’s how important it is. WebAssembly on the server is the future of computing.” - Quote I think we need to let this sink in for a few moments.
